<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Creates binary descriptor for the given device images. Binary descriptor</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// is an object that is passed to the offloading runtime at program startup</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and it describes all device images available in the executable or shared</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// library. It is defined as follows</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#95;&#95;attribute&#95;&#95;((visibility(&quot;hidden&quot;)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// extern &#95;&#95;tgt&#95;offload&#95;entry &#42;&#95;&#95;start&#95;omp&#95;offloading&#95;entries;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#95;&#95;attribute&#95;&#95;((visibility(&quot;hidden&quot;)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// extern &#95;&#95;tgt&#95;offload&#95;entry &#42;&#95;&#95;stop&#95;omp&#95;offloading&#95;entries;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// static const char Image0&#91;&#93; = &#123; &lt;Bufs.front() contents&gt; &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// static const char ImageN&#91;&#93; = &#123; &lt;Bufs.back() contents&gt; &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// static const &#95;&#95;tgt&#95;device&#95;image Images&#91;&#93; = &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Create the register globals function. We will iterate all of the offloading</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// entries stored at the begin / end symbols and register them according to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// their type. This creates the following function in IR:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// extern struct &#95;&#95;tgt&#95;offload&#95;entry &#95;&#95;start&#95;cuda&#95;offloading&#95;entries;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// extern struct &#95;&#95;tgt&#95;offload&#95;entry &#95;&#95;stop&#95;cuda&#95;offloading&#95;entries;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// extern void &#95;&#95;cudaRegisterFunction(void &#42;&#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, int,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                                    void &#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, int &#42;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// extern void &#95;&#95;cudaRegisterVar(void &#42;&#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, void &#42;, int32&#95;t,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                               int64&#95;t, int32&#95;t, int32&#95;t);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// void &#95;&#95;cudaRegisterTest(void &#42;&#42;fatbinHandle) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   for (struct &#95;&#95;tgt&#95;offload&#95;entry &#42;entry = &amp;&#95;&#95;start&#95;cuda&#95;offloading&#95;entries;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///        entry != &amp;&#95;&#95;stop&#95;cuda&#95;offloading&#95;entries; ++entry) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     if (entry-&gt;Kind != OFK&#95;CUDA)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       continue</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     if (!entry-&gt;Size)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       &#95;&#95;cudaRegisterFunction(fatbinHandle, entry-&gt;addr, entry-&gt;name,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///                              entry-&gt;name, -1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///     else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///       &#95;&#95;cudaRegisterVar(fatbinHandle, entry-&gt;addr, entry-&gt;name, entry-&gt;name,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-offloadwrapper-cpp-/#aa95d3be8182edf7e68419d38f31dc9de"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-offloadwrapper-cpp-/#aa95d3be8182edf7e68419d38f31dc9de">createRegisterGlobalsFunction</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/module">Module</a> &amp;M, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsHIP,</span></CodeLine>
